document_title: Acute arthritis: Causes, signs, treatment, prevention
subsection_name: viem-khop-cap.json_1_Differences between acute arthritis and common arthritis
subsection_content: Unlike regular arthritis, acute arthritis occurs suddenly and is not caused by injury. Some possible causes of acute joint pain other than arthritis include: bursitis, sprains, gout, inflammation from injury, overuse, etc. Depending on the severity, this condition usually goes away. over several weeks with self-care and conservative treatment. (first)
subsection_title: viem khop cap.json. Differences between acute arthritis and common arthritis
subsection_data:
viem khop cap.json. Differences between acute arthritis and common arthritis
Unlike regular arthritis, acute arthritis occurs suddenly and is not caused by injury. Some possible causes of acute joint pain other than arthritis include: bursitis, sprains, gout, inflammation from injury, overuse, etc. Depending on the severity, this condition usually goes away. over several weeks with self-care and conservative treatment. (first)
